div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 498px; height: 1px; padding-top: 20px; margin-left: 402px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 24px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(26, 26, 46), rgb(213, 213, 230)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(13, 13, 23), rgb(225, 225, 234));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #06d6a0;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#06d6a0, #008859); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
#!/bin/bash
# ↑ Shebang - specifies interpreter
set -euo pipefail
# ↑ Error handling options
# Variables
NAME="value"
readonly CONST="constant"
# Functions
my_function() {
local var="$1"
echo "$var"
}
# Main logic
main() {
my_function "hello"
}
main "$@"

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 432px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(67, 97, 238), rgb(121, 147, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(58, 86, 212), rgb(134, 158, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 328px; height: 1px; padding-top: 102px; margin-left: 343px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# Assignment (NO spaces around =)
name="John"
age=25
# Using variables
echo "$name"
echo "${name}" # Safer
echo "${name}_file" # Concatenation
# String operations
${#str} # Length
${str:0:5} # Substring
${str/old/new} # Replace
${var:-default} # Default value

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 65px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 249, 250), rgb(22, 23, 24)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(222, 226, 230), rgb(41, 44, 48));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 248px; height: 1px; padding-top: 107px; margin-left: 753px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #1a1a2e;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
$0 Script name
$1-$9 Arguments 1-9
$# Number of arguments
$@ All args (separate words)
$* All args (single string)
$? Exit status of last cmd
$$ Current process ID
$! PID of last background job

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 395px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(114, 9, 183), rgb(255, 169, 255)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(95, 8, 150), rgb(255, 180, 255));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 432px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# if/elif/else
if [[ $a -gt 10 ]]; then
echo "Greater"
elif [[ $a -eq 10 ]]; then
echo "Equal"
else
echo "Less"
fi
# case
case $1 in
start) echo "Starting" ;;
stop) echo "Stopping" ;;
*) echo "Unknown" ;;
esac

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 643px; margin-left: 52px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(248, 249, 250), rgb(22, 23, 24)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(222, 226, 230), rgb(41, 44, 48));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 278px; height: 1px; padding-top: 682px; margin-left: 13px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #1a1a2e;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
NUMERIC STRING FILE
-eq equal = equal -f is file
-ne not equal != not equal -d is dir
-lt less -z is empty -e exists
-gt greater -n not empty -r readable
-le less/eq -w writable
-ge great/eq -x executable
LOGICAL: && (AND) || (OR) ! (NOT)

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 315px; margin-left: 432px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 328px; height: 1px; padding-top: 352px; margin-left: 343px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# for loop - list
for item in apple banana cherry; do
echo "$item"
done
# for loop - range
for i in {1..10}; do
echo "$i"
done
# for loop - C-style
for ((i=0; i<5; i++)); do
echo "$i"
done
# while loop
while [[ $count -lt 5 ]]; do
echo "$count"
((count++))
done

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 315px; margin-left: 832px;

display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 585px; margin-left: 832px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(255, 209, 102), rgb(93, 54, 0)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(230, 188, 92), rgb(108, 72, 0));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 258px; height: 1px; padding-top: 622px; margin-left: 743px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #1a1a2e;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# Read input
read -p "Enter name: " name
read -sp "Password: " pass
# Command substitution
today=$(date +%Y-%m-%d)
files=$(ls -1 | wc -l)
# Arithmetic
result=$((5 + 3))
((count++))
# Redirect
cmd > file # stdout to file
cmd 2> file # stderr to file
cmd &> file # both to file
cmd >> file # append

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 198px; height: 1px; padding-top: 645px; margin-left: 432px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center; color: #1a1a2e;

display: inline-block; font-size: 16px; font-family: "Helvetica"; color: light-dark(#1a1a2e, #d5d5e6); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; font-weight: bold; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

rect.style: fill: light-dark(rgb(233, 69, 96), rgb(255, 115, 138)); stroke: light-dark(rgb(199, 62, 84), rgb(249, 131, 150));

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 328px; height: 1px; padding-top: 682px; margin-left: 343px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left; color: #ffffff;
display: inline-block; font-size: 10px; font-family: "Courier New"; color: light-dark(#ffffff, #121212); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
# Exit on error
set -e # Exit if any command fails
set -u # Error on undefined variable
set -o pipefail # Catch pipe failures
# Trap for cleanup
cleanup() { rm -f "$temp_file"; }
trap cleanup EXIT
# Check exit status
if ! command; then
echo "Failed!"; exit 1
fi

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
